title: Multimedia-Based University Self-Directed Learning Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in digital device usage and intermediate-level expertise in social sciences
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, focusing on social sector projects applicable to real-world tasks

learning_goals: Can autonomously select social studies project topics and develop learning plans using multimedia content
Can collect, analyze, and integrate project-related materials using smartphone-based tools to produce final outputs
Can evaluate and reflect on achievements and areas for improvement in self-directed learning through peer review

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
